pageTitle: Track replacement works to improve the Central line

title.title: Track replacement works to improve the Central line

texts: Buses will replace trains between Loughton and Epping on the 2, 3, 9 and 10 July as track replacement works at Theydon Bois are being carried out to improve the running of the Central line.
Two rail replacement bus services will operate between
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Epping and Theydon Bois and","Loughton and Epping (calling at Debden)"]}
Customers are advised to allow an extra 30 minutes to complete their journeys, especially those wishing to make the last train connections.
For 24-hour information on all London travel, please call: 020 7222 1234 or visit TfL's website

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Metronet Rail BCV is responsible for the maintenance and renewal of the Bakerloo, Central, Victoria and Waterloo \u0026 City lines","TfL is investing Â£10 billion over the next five years to improve and expand London's transport network, over half of that in the Tube."]}
